page.title: 16THE PEOPLE OF UPPER HOPTON
page.content: Most of the old people have lived in { {Upper Hopton} for over 5O years. They think the village is lovely and friendly. They remember Upper Hopton when there were more{green fields}and the{new estates}weren't built. They do not like the new houses . They worry about vandalism and would like the village{policeman}to come round more often, but most old people are happy with the village as it is. Most of the younger people live in the new houses. They think the village is{friendly,} {peaceful and quiet.}They would like a proper park instead of the{recreation {ground.}They think the new houses blend in well with the old but don't want any more new building. They think that the bus service could be improved.{Teenagers}would like the rec. improved. However, they too don't want Upper Hopton to change very much.
